questions.question: 1. The value of d equal to or greater than ____, the two populations completely mixed, the population is considered as single population rater than two subpopulations.
2. Populations of ________ and ___________are good examples of metapopulation.

answers.b: Ground squirrels and Logger head turtle

answers.a: Probability that the individual disperse from its sub population
answers.b: Degree to which the environments of the two subpopulations vary with regards to each other
answers.c: Initial number of individuals in the population
answers.d: Population growth rate in good years
